item.title: Intenship
item.description: Looking for critical thinkers! We are looking to mentor critical thinkers in solving real-life problems with complex solutions across all domains of knowledge in a professional research environment. Abstract Rs. 5000 monthly stipend Solutions are directly applied on all levels of the company Precursor to long-term employment in the company Performance bonus Duration 3 months, extendable up to 6 Mode We operate out of TIFR hyderabad, but we welcome work from home applicants provided they have reliable internet connection.
